ResearchProjectDef.label: basic density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic techniques for increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome, allowing the ability to grow four times the crops in the same amount of space. A first step toward denser farming.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Techniques for increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome, allowing the ability to grow ten times the crops in the same amount of space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Techniques for further increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome, allowing the ability to grow twenty times the crops in the same amount of space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quantum density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: By leveraging quantum entanglement, crop density can now be scaled dynamically with available power. The future of farming is measured in energy, not space.
